description: Gets a user profile in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: the ID of the Amazon DataZone domain the data portal of which you want to get.

parameters.name: userIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the user for which you want to get the user profile.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of an IAM user profile in Amazon DataZone.

nested_items.name: firstName
nested_items.description: The first name included in the single sign-on details of the user profile.

nested_items.name: lastName
nested_items.description: The last name included in the single sign-on details of the user profile.

nested_items.name: username
nested_items.description: The username included in the single sign-on details of the user profile.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: the identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain of which you want to get the user profile.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the user profile.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the user profile.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the user profile.
